pages.title: Quest Book
pages.text: There is a $(l)Quest System$() in Vault Hunters, which is the main guide in game. Whether a beginner or experienced vault hunter, we recommend you to completely read every description of quests and complete them in order. $(br2)You can press $(t:"]" by default and can be modified in Key Binding)$(l)the corresponding key$() to open quest screen, or Right-click with Quest Book.

pages.title: Quest
pages.text: $(br)Quests are unlocked $(l)in order$(). Each quest has its own $(l)Quest Description$(), which introduces a $(l)game mechanic$() you need to understand at your current game stage. $(br2)After completing quests you can open Quest screen to $(l)claim rewards$(). Some rewards are $(l)quite valuable$(), so try your best to complete them!
